name: Tool Rush - Time's Up!
description:
Complete the puzzles in this game to proceed.

Please note that these games are not yet finished and would require more time to make other levels. Don't rate this game because of the number of levels, but how well quality you think the game was.

You must restore peace to destroy the land by destroying the evil factory letting me inside this game.

"I had 'troubles' with working with WebGL + Unity, so you will have to download it sry."

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMER: ME

ARTIST: ME

ANYTHING ELSE OTHER THAN BELOW: ME

SFX DESIGN: THERE IS NONE

MUSIC DESIGNER: LEXICA AND JOSEF BEL HABIB

INSPIRATION: YOU :)

Other than that,  enjoy!
